adjective.description: Relating to or denoting the main culture of the Middle Paleolithic period in Europe, between the Acheulian and Aurignacian periods (chiefly 80,000–35,000 years ago), and associated with Neanderthal peoples.

origin: Late 19th century: from French moustiérien, from Le Moustier, a cave in SW France where objects from this culture were found.
